topic.title: HPE Helion Public Cloud Load Balancer Service Overview

body.p: The HPE Helion Public Cloud Load Balancer Service provides you with a managed service that lets you enable automatic traffic routing to multiple back-end servers hosted by HP.
The HPE Helion Public Cloud Load Balancer Service is currently in private beta. Please request access on our sign-up page. Service use is free of charge during the private beta period.

section.title: API
section.p: Do you need low level, raw REST API access to HPE Helion Public Cloud Load Balancer Service? Take a look at the Load Balancer Service API page.
